tool_description: Coordinates and orchestrates the complete digital signing workflow, managing the sequence of validation, preparation, and signing steps for optimal results.

document_path.description: Path to document to be signed

workflow_type.description: Type of signing workflow: simple, advanced, or batch

validation_steps.description: Specific validation steps to include in workflow

auto_proceed.description: Whether to automatically proceed through workflow steps

priority_level.description: Workflow priority: low, normal, or high

timeout_minutes.description: Maximum workflow execution time in minutes

retry_attempts.description: Number of retry attempts for failed steps

output_directory.description: Directory path for workflow output files

error_messages: Workflow initialization failed: Cannot initialize signing workflow with provided parameters.
Invalid workflow type: Specified workflow type is not supported.
Resource unavailable: Required resources for workflow execution are not available.
Timeout exceeded: Workflow execution exceeded specified timeout limit.
Validation step failed: One or more validation steps failed and workflow cannot proceed.
Certificate access error: Cannot access or read signing certificate for workflow.
Output directory error: Cannot access or create specified output directory.
Priority level invalid: Specified priority level is not recognized.
Retry limit exceeded: Maximum number of retry attempts has been exceeded.
Checkpoint failure: Cannot save workflow checkpoint data.
Compliance mode error: Specified compliance mode is not supported.
usage: Provide document_path, certificate_path, and workflow_type to initiate signing workflow coordination. Configure workflow behavior using validation_steps, auto_proceed, and other parameters. Monitor workflow progress through returned status updates.

workflow_id.description: Unique identifier for the workflow instance

workflow_status.description: Current status of the workflow execution
